name: LEATHER OFFICE CHAIR
description: A fashionable chair for comfy working and increased productivity

name: SHOE RACK CONSOLE UNIT
description: It is a slim-profile, wall-leaning storage unit designed for entryways. It features open tiered rails for ventilated shoe storage, a top ledge for small items like keys or mail, and a base drawer cabinet for hidden storage of accessories. Its minimalist white finish and vertical design make it ideal for narrow hallways or small apartments.

name: COFFEE TABLE
description: The coffee table comes with matching stools and customer specified colour during ordering..

name: MODERN VANITY DRESSING TABLE WITH A MIRROR & STOOL
MODERN VANITY DRESSING TABLE WITH A MIRROR & STOOL
OFFICE CABINET
description: This is a Filing and Storage Cupboard. It is a functional industrial-style unit divided into three sections: a top glass-door display for files, a middle section with a locking drawer and side cabinet, and a large double-door base for bulkier items. Its durable metal construction is designed for office or workshop organization.

name: OFFICE CHAIR
description: A cheap and durable fashionable office chair

name: OFFICE CHAIR
description: It’s built for durability, using a metal frame with padded vinyl or faux-leather upholstery, which makes it very easy to clean—perfect for high-traffic areas.

name: DINING SET-UP
description:
The Chairs
Vibrant Upholstery: The chairs are finished in a rich, mustard-yellow or ochre fabric, likely a soft velvet or chenille.
Tufted Details: The deep button-tufting on the backrests adds a classic, luxurious feel while providing extra cushioning.
Nailhead Trim: You can see metallic studding along the edges, which defines the silhouette and adds an industrial-glam touch.
High Back Design: The wingback-style structure offers significant ergonomic support for long dinners.
The Table
Oval Shape: The rounded edges are great for flow in a room and make it easier to squeeze in an extra guest if needed.
Modern Surface: The white tabletop features a geometric "starburst" or radiating line pattern, giving it a unique architectural look compared to plain marble or wood.

name: OFFICE CHAIR
description:
Breathable Mesh Back: The chairs utilize a high-tension mesh backrest, which allows for maximum airflow to keep the user cool.
Adjustable Headrest: A wide, padded headrest provides essential neck support and can be adjusted to match the user's height.
Lumbar Support: Visible structural bracing on the back provides targeted support for the lower spine to improve posture.
Polished Chrome Base: The five-star base is finished in polished metal, offering high stability and a sleek, modern look that complements the executive aesthetic.

name: OFFICE DESK
description:
Executive Silhouette: The desk features a thick, polished wood-grain finish—likely mahogany or cherry veneer—with a high-gloss protective coating.
Inlaid Desk Pad: The main workspace includes a built-in dark gray or black blotter/pad, which provides a comfortable writing surface and protects the wood finish from wear.
Cable Management: Small silver grommets are visible on the desk surface, allowing you to thread computer and phone cables neatly through the frame to keep the top clutter-free.
Integrated Storage: The set includes a matching mobile pedestal (two drawers) and a side cabinet unit, providing ample space for files and office supplies.

name: NESTING COFFEE TEBLES
description:
Marble Finish: The white tops feature gray veining, mimicking the look of Carrara marble. It adds a touch of luxury while being easier to maintain than real stone.
Gold Accents: The metallic gold-finished frames provide a warm contrast to the cool marble tones.
C-Frame Geometry: The open, circular base allows the smaller table to tuck completely under the larger one, making them ideal for smaller living rooms or apartments

name: SIX SEATER DINING SET
description:
A modern and functional dining solution for the whole family.
Table: Features a spacious, durable dark-top rectangular surface.
Chairs: Includes six matching metal-frame chairs with decorative backrests and padded seats.
Design: Sleek industrial style that fits easily into contemporary dining rooms.
Category: Table (Dining Set)
Crown-Back Banquet Chairs
Professional-grade seating designed for comfort and easy storage.
Build: Sturdy metal frames with high-density foam cushions.
Features: Elegant "crown" back shape and fully stackable for space-saving storage.
Variety: Available in multiple upholstery colors (Black, Blue, Red) with gold or silver frames.
Category: Chair (Event/Commercial Seating)

name: BANQUET CHAIRS
description:
Durable and comfortable seating designed for high-traffic events and ceremonies.
Build: Heavy-duty metal frame with a high-density foam cushion.
Convenience: Fully stackable design for easy transport and storage.
Style: Available in multiple colors (Black, Blue, Red) with a gold or silver finish.

name: CURIO CABINET
description:
Maximize your storage with this slim, vertical hutch cabinet. Featuring a crisp white finish and modern gold-toned hardware, this piece seamlessly blends style with utility.
Display Storage: Two tall glass doors open to three spacious shelves, perfect for showcasing dinnerware, collectibles, or books.
Convenient Drawer: A wide central drawer provides hidden storage for smaller essentials like linens or utensils.
Versatile Design: Its narrow footprint makes it an ideal fit for kitchens, dining rooms, or even as a luxury linen tower in a bathroom.
